title: of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 408 of 2020))
heading: (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Planning and Development
text_raw:
1. 

(1) These Regulations may be cited as the Planning and Development 

Act (Amendment) Regulations 2023. 

(2) These Regulations shall be included in the collective citation the 

Planning and Development Regulations 2001 to 2023. 

Interpretation
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited planning development act (amendment) regulation 2023 (2) regulation shall included collective citation planning development regulation 2001 2023 interpretation

title: of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 408 of 2020))
heading: In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the Planning and
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the Planning and 

Development Regulations, 2001 (S.I. No. 600 of 2001). 

Amendment to Article 186(1A) of the Principal Regulations
text_norm: 2 regulation principal regulation mean planning development regulation 2001 (s.i no 600 2001) amendment article 186(1a) principal regulation

title: of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 408 of 2020))
heading: 3. Article 186 (1A) of the Principal Regulations is amended by the
text_raw:
3. Article 186 (1A) of the Principal Regulations is amended by the 
substitution of “24 month” for “12 month” and by the substitution of “24 
months” for “12 months”. 

GIVEN under my Hand, 

1 June, 2023. 

KIERAN O’DONNELL, 

Minister of State at the Department of Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 6th June, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [273] 3

text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Planning and Development Regulations, 2001 to
text_norm: explanatory note (this note part instrument purport legal interpretation.) regulation amend planning development regulation 2001

title: of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 408 of 2020))
heading: 2023. They amend the period during which a pre-application consultation
text_raw:
2023. They amend the period during which a pre-application consultation 
meeting under article 184 must take place, involving the person who intends to 
make an application for an event licence, the local authority and the prescribed 
bodies. They extend this from during the 12 month period prior to the date of the 
event to during the 24 month period prior to the date of the event. In the case of 
an application for a number of events at a venue in a period not exceeding one 
year, the period is extended from 12 months prior to the holding of the first event 
to 24 months prior to the holding of the first event. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [273]
